mxCell.value: Template_ID UUID DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
Template_Code VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL, -- e.g., ITP-STS-MECH-ANN
Title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
Revision_No INT DEFAULT 1
Applicable_Asset_Type VARCHAR(20), -- STS, RTG, RMG
Standard_Reference VARCHAR(100), -- e.g., ASME B30.2, ISO 4309
Approved_By UUID, -- Reference to User_Registry
Created_At TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
Is_Active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE
Template_ID UUID REFERENCES ITP_Templates(Template_ID) ON DELETE CASCADE
Task_ID UUID DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
Sequence_Order INT NOT NULL
Task_Description TEXT NOT NULL
Component_Category VARCHAR(50), -- Electrical, Mechanical, Structural
Inspection_Method VARCHAR(50), -- Visual, Ultrasonic, Functional Test, NDT
Is_Mandatory BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE
Task_ID UUID REFERENCES Inspection_Tasks(Task_ID) ON DELETE CASCADE
Control_ID UUID DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
Point_Type CHAR(1) CHECK (Point_Type IN ('H', 'W', 'M', 'R'))
-- H: Hold (Work stops until signed)
-- W: Witness (QA must see)
-- M: Monitor (Spot check)
-- R: Record (Just document)
Required_Role VARCHAR(50) -- e.g., 'Senior Engineer', 'Third Party Inspector'
Task_ID UUID REFERENCES Inspection_Tasks(Task_ID) ON DELETE CASCADE
Threshold_ID UUID DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
Data_Type VARCHAR(20), -- Quantitative (Numeric) or Qualitative (Pass/Fail)
Min_Value NUMERIC(10,4), -- e.g., 5.00 for brake thickness
Max_Value NUMERIC(10,4), -- e.g., 8.00
UOM VARCHAR(10), -- mm, PSI, Ohms, Bar
Target_Response VARCHAR(50), -- For qualitative (e.g., 'No visible cracks')
Failure_Severity VARCHAR(20) -- Low, Medium, High, Safety Critical

EntityPrimary KeyKey AttributesPurpose
ITP_TemplateTemplate_IDTitle, Rev No, Crane Type, Standard RefThe digital version of the manual ITP doc.
Inspection_TaskTask_IDSequence, Description, Method (NDT/Visual)The individual steps of the inspection.
Control_PointsControl_IDH (Hold), W (Witness), M (Monitor)Defines mandatory supervision checkpoints.
Threshold_MasterThreshold_IDMin/Max Value, UOM (mm, PSI, C)The "Pass/Fail" mathematical boundaries.
ITP Strategy & Logic Model

Template_IDTemplate_CodeTitleCrane_TypeStandard_Ref
T-STS-001STS-ANN-MECHAnnual Mechanical InspectionSTSISO 4309 / FEM 1.001
T-RTG-002RTG-CON-STRNew Construction Structural NCRRTGAWS D1.1 (Welding)
T-STS-003STS-QTR-ELECQuarterly Electrical SafetySTSIEC 60204-32

1. ITP Templates (The Master Plan)

This table stores the high-level inspection frameworks for different life-cycles.

Task_IDTemplate_IDSeqTask_DescriptionComponent_CategoryMethod
TK-101T-STS-00110Main Hoist Brake Lining WearMechanicalMeasurement
TK-102T-STS-00120Wire Rope Diameter CheckMechanicalCaliper
TK-103T-STS-00130Boom Hinge Pin LubricationMaintenanceVisual
TK-104T-STS-00140Gantry Rail AlignmentStructuralLaser Tracking

2. Inspection Tasks (The Steps)

These are the specific tasks linked to the STS-ANN-MECH template.

Threshold_IDTask_IDData_TypeMin_ValueMax_ValueUOMTarget_ResponseSeverity

TH-102TK-102Numeric28.531.0mmN/AMajor

TH-104TK-104Numeric-2.02.0mmN/AMajor

3. Task Thresholds (The Pass/Fail Engine)

This logic determines if an entry triggers an NCR or Defect.

Control_IDTask_IDPoint_TypeRequired_RoleDescription
CP-001TK-101H (Hold)Senior EngineerSystem locks until Brake Test is verified.
CP-002TK-102W (Witness)QC InspectorInspector must be present for measurement.
CP-003TK-104R (Record)TechnicianStandard data entry; no signature required.

4. ITP Control Points (The Governance)

This defines the "Hold Points" where an Engineer must sign off before work continues.
